service¶

Identity v2, v3

service create¶

Create new service

os service create
    [--name <name>]
    [--description <description>]
    [--enable | --disable]
    <type>
--name <name>¶

New service name

--description <description>¶

New service description

--enable¶

Enable service (default)

Identity version 3 only

--disable¶

Disable service

Identity version 3 only

<type>

New service type (compute, image, identity, volume, etc)

service delete¶

Delete service

os service delete
    <service>
<service>

Service to delete (type, name or ID)

service list¶

List services

os service list
    [--long]
--long¶

List additional fields in output

Returns service fields ID, Name and Type. --long adds Description and Enabled (Identity version 3 only) to the output.

service set¶

Set service properties

  • Identity version 3 only*
os service set
    [--type <type>]
    [--name <name>]
    [--description <description>]
    [--enable | --disable]
    <service>
--type <type>¶

New service type (compute, image, identity, volume, etc)

--name <name>¶

New service name

--description <description>¶

New service description

--enable¶

Enable service

--disable¶

Disable service

<service>

Service to update (type, name or ID)

service show¶

Display service details

os service show
    [--catalog]
    <service>
--catalog¶

Show service catalog information

Identity version 2 only

<service>

Service to display (type, name or ID)
